This folder contains the source / binaries for 3rd party projects used by NetGore. Contents are typically unmodified from the original.

Lidgren.Network:
http://code.google.com/p/lidgren-network-gen3/
2012-10-27

WeifenLuo.WinFormsUI.Docking:
http://sourceforge.net/projects/dockpanelsuite/
v2.7

log4net:
http://logging.apache.org/log4net/download_log4net.cgi
v1.2.11

log4net.dummy:
A custom empty implementation of log4net. Used by InstallationValidator to allow code referencing logging to compile
without actually generating the log4net binary. Can be used by other projects for the same purpose.
